title: Rethinking our Relationship with Food - Englewood Health
author: Michael Chananie
description: The Graf Center for Integrative Medicine was featured in an article discussing the disconnect between what we know and what we do when it comes to our food and health. The author interviewed a clean eating chef and a holistic nutritional counselor affiliated with the Graf Center. Read full article from Vue Magazine
